title: Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse
text:

Ohn)]]|-|Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse}} * {{1st|[[Sinister Six (Earth-42)|Sinister Six Cartel (Earth-42)]]}} ** {{1st|[[Otto Octavius (Earth-42)|Doctor Octopus (Otto Octavius) (Earth-42)]]}} ** {{1st|[[Adrian Toomes (Earth-42)|Vulture (Adrian Toomes) (Earth-42)]]}} ** {{1st|[[MacDonald Gargan (Earth-42)|Scorpion (Macdonald Gargan) (Earth-42)]]}} ** {{1st|[[Aleksei Sytsevich (Earth-42)|Rhino (Aleksei Sytsevich) (Earth-42)]]}} ** {{1st|[[Flint Marko (Earth-42)|Sandman (Flint Marko) (Earth-42)]]}} ** {{1st|[[Maxwell Dillon (Earth-42)|Electro (Maxwell Dillon) (Earth-42)]]}} * {{apn|[[Sergei Across the Spider-Verse]]}} ** {{1st|[[John Jonah Jameson (Earth-42)|J. Jonah Jameson (Earth-42)]]}} '''Races and Species:''' * {{a|[[Humans (Homo sapiens)|Humans]]}} * {{a|[[Category:Pig/Spider Hybrids|Pig-Spider-Hybrids]]}} '''Locations:''' * [[Multiverse]] ** [[Earth-42]] ** [[Earth-1610B]] '''Items:''' * {{a|[[Spider-Man's Suit|Spider-Men's Suits]]}} ** {{a|[[Spider-Man's 2099 Suit]]}} ** {{a|[[Spider-Man's Noir Suit]]}} * {{a|[[Scarlet Spider's Suit]]}} and {{a|[[Spider-Man's Utility Belt|Utility Belt]]}} * {{a|[[SP//dr Suit]]}} * {{a|[[Spider-Woman's Suit|Spider-Women's Suits]]}} * {{a|[[Web-Shooters]]}} * {{a|[[Dimensional Travel Watch]]}} * {{a|[[Prowler's Suit]]}} * {{a|[[Doctor Octopus' Tentacles]]}} * {{a|[[Vulture's Wings]]}} * {{a|[[Scorpion's Suit]]}} * {{a|[[Rhino Armor]]}} * Hobbie's Guitar '''Vehicles:''' * Jess Drew's motorcycle | Plot =Miles Morales is now a fugitive on the run from every other Spider in the multiverse, and Gwen and his other friends might not be enough to help him. | Cast = * {{WP|Shameik Moore}} as [[Miles Morales (Earth-1610B)|Spider-Man / Miles Morales]] * {{WP|Hailee Steinfeld}} as [[Gwendolyn Stacy (Earth-65B)|Spider-Woman / Gwen Stacy]] * {{WP|Jake Johnson}} as [[Peter Parker (Earth-616B)|Spider-Man / Peter B. Parker]] * {{WP|Karan Soni}} as [[Pavitr Prabhakar (Earth-50101B)|Spider-Man / Pavitr Prabhakar]] * {{WP|Daniel Kaluuya}} as [[Hobart Brown (Earth-138B)|Spider-Punk / Hobie Brown]] * {{WP|Oscar Isaac}} as [[Miguel O'Hara (Earth-928)|Spider-Man / Miguel O'Hara]] * {{WP|Kimiko Glenn}} as [[Peni Parker (Earth-14512B)|Sp//dr / Peni Parker]] * {{WP|Jason Schwartzman}} as [[Johnathon Ohnn (Earth-1610B)|Spot / Johnathon Ohn]] * {{WP|Jharrel Jerome}} as [[Miles Morales (Earth-42)|Prowler / Miles G. Morales]] | Notes = * This film was originally assumed to be titled ''Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse (Part Two)'', based on what the previous film entry was called. However, after the previous film dropped the "Part One" from its title and simply became {{ml|Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse}},{{cite web|url= https://deadline.com/2022/04/spider-man-across-the-spider-verse-summer-2023-theatrical-release-sony-release-date-changes-1235007010/|title= ‘Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse’ Heads To Summer 2023; Sony Dates ‘Equalizer 3’ Among Other Release Changes|work= Deadline|last= D'Alessandro|first= Anthony|date= April 20, 2022|accessdate= May 14, 2022}} this film was later re-titled to ''Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse''.{{cite web|url= https://deadline.com/2022/04/spider-man-across-the-spider-verse-fresh-footage-shown-at-cinemacon-part-2s-title-revealed-1235009498/|title= ‘Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse’ Fresh Footage Shown At CinemaCon, Part 2’s Title Revealed|work= Deadline|last= D'Alessandro|first= Anthony|coauthors= Goldsmith, Jill; Tartaglione, Nancy|date= April 25, 2022|accessdate= May 14, 2022}} * Initially slated to be released on March 29, 2024, this film would later be removed from Sony's release calender, due to the [[wikipedia:2023 Hollywood labor disputes|2023 Writers & Actors Strikes]].{{cite web|url= https://variety.com/2023/film/news/spider-man-beyond-the-spider-verse-kraven-release-date-pushed-2024-strikes-1235682520/|title= ‘Beyond the Spider-Verse’ Taken Off Sony Release Calendar as Strikes Delay ‘Kraven’ and ‘Ghostbusters’ Sequel to 2024|work= Deadline|last= Donnelly|first= Matt|date= July 28, 2023|accessdate= July 30, 2023}} | Trivia = | Links = * [[Marvel Films#Upcoming Films|Marvel Films]]}}
